error-title-length: Title must be 50 characters or less
error-title-characters: Title must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-first-name-blank: Enter the director’s full first name
error-first-name-characters: First name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-first-name-length: First name must be 50 characters or less
error-middle-name-characters: Middle name or names must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-middle-name-length: Middle names must be 50 characters or less
error-last-name-characters: Last name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-last-name-length: Last name must be 160 characters or less
error-former-names-length: Previous names must be 160 characters or less
error-former-names-characters: Previous names must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-previous-names-radio-unselected: Select yes if the director used a different name for business purposes in the last 20 years
error-previous-names-missing: Enter the director’s previous name or names
error-change-date-missing-day: Date the director’s details changed must include a day
error-change-date-missing-month: Date the director’s details changed must include a month
error-change-date-missing-year: Date the director’s details changed must include a year
error-change-date-missing-day-month: Date the director’s details changed must include a day and month
error-change-date-missing-day-year: Date the director’s details changed must include a day and year
error-change-date-missing-month-year: Date the director’s details changed must include a month and year
error-change-date-missing-day-month-year: Enter the date the director’s details changed
error-change-date-invalid: Date the director’s details changed must be a real date
error-change-date-before-appointment-dat: Enter a date that is on or after the date the director was appointed
error-change-date-in-future: Enter a date that is today or in the past
error-change-date-before-incorporation-d: Enter a date that is on or after the company's incorporation date
error-change-date-before-2009: Date the director’s details changed must be on or after 1 October 2009
error-invalid-nationality: Select a nationality from the list
error-nationality-length: Nationality must be 50 characters or less
error-nationality-length49: For technical reasons, we are currently unable to accept dual nationalities with a total of more than 49 characters
error-nationality-length48: For technical reasons, we are currently unable to accept multiple nationalities with a total of more than 48 characters
error-occupation-length: Occupation must be 100 characters or less
error-occupation-characters: Occupation must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-removal-date-missing-day: Date the director was removed must include a day
error-removal-date-missing-month: Date the director was removed must include a month
error-removal-date-missing-year: Date the director was removed must include a year
error-removal-date-missing-day-month: Date the director was removed must include a day and a month
error-removal-date-missing-day-year: Date the director was removed must include a day and a year
error-removal-date-missing-month-year: Date the director was removed must include a month and a year
error-removal-date-missing-day-month-yea: Enter the date the director was removed
error-removal-date-invalid: Date the director was removed must be a real date
error-removal-date-after-appointment-dat: Enter a date that is on or after the date the director was appointed
error-removal-date-in-past: Enter a date that is today or in the past
error-removal-date-after-incorporation-d: Enter a date that is on or after the company's incorporation date
error-removal-date-after-2009: Enter a date that is on or after 1 October 2009. If the director was removed before this date, you must file form 288b instead
error-sa-to-roa: Select yes if the registered office address changes in the future, and you want this to apply to your correspondence address too
error-postal-code-invalid: We cannot find this postcode. Enter a different one, or enter the address manually
error-postal-code-characters: UK postcode must only include letters a to z, numbers and spaces
error-postal-code-length: UK postcode must be 20 characters or less
error-postal-code-full-invalid: Enter a UK postcode. If the address is outside the UK, enter the address manually
error-premises-characters: Property name or number must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-premises-length: Property name or number must be 200 characters or less
error-dob-date-missing-day: Date of birth must include a day
error-dob-date-missing-month: Date of birth must include a month
error-dob-date-missing-year: Date of birth must include a year
error-dob-date-missing-day-month: Date of birth must include a day and a month
error-dob-date-missing-day-year: Date of birth must include a day and a year
error-dob-date-missing-month-year: Date of birth must include a month and a year
error-dob-date-missing-day-month-year: Enter the director’s date of birth
error-dob-date-invalid: Date of birth must be a real date
error-date-of-birth-blank: Enter the director’s date of birth
error-date-of-birth-overage: You can only appoint a person as a director if they are under 110 years old
error-date-of-birth-underage: You can only appoint a person as a director if they are at least 16 years old
error-appointment-date-missing-day: Date the director was appointed must include a day
error-appointment-date-missing-month: Date the director was appointed must include a month
error-appointment-date-missing-year: Date the director was appointed must include a year
error-appointment-date-missing-day-month: Date the director was appointed must include a day and a month
error-appointment-date-missing-day-year: Date the director was appointed must include a day and a year
error-appointment-date-missing-month-yea: Date the director was appointed must include a month and a year
error-appointment-date-missing-day-month: Enter the date the director was appointed
error-appointment-date-invalid: Date the director was appointed must be a real date
error-appointment-date-in-past: Enter a date that is today or in the past
error-appointment-date-after-incorporati: Date the director was appointed must be on or after the incorporation date
error-appointment-date-underage: You can only appoint a person as a director if they are at least 16 years old
error-appointment-date-missing: Enter the date the director was appointed
error-no-protected-details-radio-button-: Select whether the director has applied to protect their details at Companies House
error-residential-address-to-corresponde: Select yes if the correspondence address changes in the future and you want this to apply to the home address
error-consent-to-act-as-director: Select if you confirm that by submitting this information, the person named has consented to act as director
error-residential-address-blank: Select the address where the director lives
error-premises-blank: Enter a property name or number
error-address-line-one-characters: Address line 1 must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-address-line-one-length: Address line 1 must be 50 characters or less
error-address-line-two-characters: Address line 2 must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-address-line-two-length: Address line 2 must be 50 characters or less
error-locality-characters: City or town must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-locality-length: City or town must be 50 characters or less
error-region-characters: County, state, province or region must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-region-length: County, state, province or region must be 50 characters or less
error-country-characters: Country must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-country-length: Country must be 50 characters or less
error-country-invalid: Select a country from the list
error-generic-postal-code-characters: Postcode or ZIP must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-generic-postal-code-length: Postcode or ZIP must be 20 characters or less
